text: Juan Ramón (born as Ellery Guy Rech; 13 January 1940 – 30 July 2020) was an Argentine singer and actor.Soledad Morillo Belloso Eufemia Y Otros Cuentos "A sabiendas de su incurable admiración por el cantante, Juan Ramón, para entonces pretendiente en silencio, la había invitado aquella tarde de 1952 al Rialto, al estreno de la película “Ahí vienen los Montero”. " He was born in Cañada de Gómez, Santa Fe. He was known for his Spanish dubbing of classic to pop French songs by Christophe such as "Aline". He also created the soundtrack for the 1970 French-Italian movie Road to Salina. Ramón died of pneumonia- related problems in Buenos Aires on 30 July 2020, aged 80.Murió el cantante Juan “Corazón” Ramón: tenía 80 años y padecía una pulmonía ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Argentine singers Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Deaths from pneumonia
